meratata pamina sitina china aarakshaka amathya saha rajya upadeshaka jenaral chang wankwan mahatha janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahatha hamuwi thibe.china aarakshaka amathyawaraya saha janadhipathiwaraya athara hamuwa ada(20) perawaruwe janadhipathi nila niwasedi sidu wu bawayi janadhipathi madhya anshaya sandahan kaleya.shri lankawa saha chinaya athara pawathna dirgha kalina sabandathawa mehidi sihipath kala janadhipathiwaraya merata swadhinathwayata saha jathika aarakshawata chinayen labena sahaya agaya kota thibe.dirgha kalayaka sita merata aarakshaka hamudawan sandaha chinayen laba dena puhunu awastha pilibanda sthuthiya pala kala janadhipathiwaraya ema puhunu awastha akhandawa laba denu athi bawata da wishwasaya pala kala bawa janadhipathi madhya anshaya sandahan kaleya.derata thula pawathina mithrashili sabandathawa hethuwen giwisum rasakata elambaena bawa sandahan kala janadhipathiwaraya prakasha kara aththe ema kisidu giwisumak mangin merata abhimanayata, swadhinathwayata saha jathika aarakshawata haniyak sidu nowana bawaya.ehidi adahas dakwamin china aarakshaka amathya chang chankwan mahatha prakasha kara aththe wathman janadhipathiwaraya yatathe shri lankawa aarthika, samajiya saha janatha subasiddhiya sandaha shakthimath padanamak wati athi bawaya.shri lankawa saha chinaya athara thanapathi sabandatha aarambha kara wasara 60k wani kalayak gathawa athi athara ema sabandatha thawaduratath shakthimath kara ganima thama rate aramuna bawa da china aarakshaka amathyawaraya mehidi prakasha kara thibe.
